description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. The Emperor Wharg III has invaded the galaxy.  Survivors of all the resistances of all planets are joined under the command of the great commander, Lucente. Lucente has created a rebellion force named the league of planets, an army to fight and take back all the planets of the Galaxy.
description.short: The Emperor Wharg III has invaded the galaxy.  Survivors of all the resistances of all planets are joined under the command of the great commander, Lucente. Lucente has created a rebellion force named the league of planets, an army to fight and take back all the planets of the Galaxy.
